      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon​(Coupon coupon)
                    throws CouponException
        Description copied from interface: CustomerService
        Purchase the coupon instance sent to the method by the logged in customer. After purchasing the coupon, coupon's quantity decrease by one.
        Specified by:
        purchaseCoupon in interface CustomerService
        Parameters:
        coupon - coupon to purchase by the logged in customer
        Throws:
        CouponException - if try to buy the same coupon more than once or coupons amount is zero or coupons end date already passed
